00029 #define SI7013_READ_TEMP       0xE0  /* Read previous T data from RH measurement
00030                                       * command*/
00031 
00032 #define SI7013_READ_RH         0xE5  /* Perform RH (and T) measurement. */
00033 
00034 #define SI7013_READ_RH_NH      0xF5  /* Perform RH (and T) measurement in no hold mode. */
00035 
00036 #define SI7013_READ_VIN        0xEE  /* Perform thermistor measurement. */
00037 
00038 #define SI7013_READ_ID1_1      0xFA
00039 #define SI7013_READ_ID1_2      0x0F
00040 #define SI7013_READ_ID2_1      0xFc
00041 #define SI7013_READ_ID2_2      0xc9
00042 
00043 #define SI7013_READ_FWREV_1    0x84
00044 #define SI7013_READ_FWREV_2    0xB8

00069 static int32_t Si7013_Measure(I2C_TypeDef *i2c, uint8_t addr, uint32_t *data,
00070                               uint8_t command)
00071 {
00072   I2C_TransferSeq_TypeDef    seq;
00073   I2C_TransferReturn_TypeDef ret;
00074   uint8_t                    i2c_read_data[2];
00075   uint8_t                    i2c_write_data[1];
00076 
00077   seq.addr  = addr;
00078   seq.flags = I2C_FLAG_WRITE_READ;
00079   /* Select command to issue */
00080   i2c_write_data[0] = command;
00081   seq.buf[0].data   = i2c_write_data;
00082   seq.buf[0].len    = 1;
00083   /* Select location/length of data to be read */
00084   seq.buf[1].data = i2c_read_data;
00085   seq.buf[1].len  = 2;
00086 
00087   ret = I2CSPM_Transfer(i2c, &seq);
00088 
00089   if (ret != i2cTransferDone)
00090   {
00091     *data = 0;
00092     return((int) ret);
00093   }
00094 
00095   *data = ((uint32_t) i2c_read_data[0] << 8) + (i2c_read_data[1] & 0xfc);
00096 
00097   return((int) 2);
00098 }

00145 /**************************************************************************/
00157 int32_t Si7013_GetFirmwareRevision(I2C_TypeDef *i2c, uint8_t addr, uint8_t *fwRev)
00158 {
00159   I2C_TransferSeq_TypeDef    seq;
00160   I2C_TransferReturn_TypeDef ret;
00161   uint8_t                    i2c_write_data[2];
00162   uint8_t                    i2c_read_data[1];
00163 
00164   seq.addr  = addr;
00165   seq.flags = I2C_FLAG_WRITE_READ;
00166   /* Select command to issue */
00167   i2c_write_data[0] = SI7013_READ_FWREV_1;
00168   i2c_write_data[1] = SI7013_READ_FWREV_2;
00169   seq.buf[0].data   = i2c_write_data;
00170   seq.buf[0].len    = 2;
00171   /* Select location/length of data to be read */
00172   seq.buf[1].data = i2c_read_data;
00173   seq.buf[1].len  = 1;
00174 
00175   ret = I2CSPM_Transfer(i2c, &seq);
00176 
00177   if (ret != i2cTransferDone)
00178   {
00179     *fwRev = 0;
00180     return (uint32_t) ret;
00181   }
00182   *fwRev = i2c_read_data[0];
00183 
00184   return (uint32_t) i2cTransferDone;
00185 }

00197 int32_t Si7013_StartNoHoldMeasureRHAndTemp(I2C_TypeDef *i2c, uint8_t addr)
00198 {
00199   int ret = Si7013_StartNoHoldMeasure(i2c, addr, SI7013_READ_RH_NH);
00200 
00201   return ret;

00218 static int32_t Si7013_ReadNoHoldData(I2C_TypeDef *i2c, uint8_t addr, uint32_t *data)
00219 {
00220   I2C_TransferSeq_TypeDef    seq;
00221   I2C_TransferReturn_TypeDef ret;
00222   uint8_t                    i2c_read_data[2];
00223 
00224   seq.addr  = addr;
00225   seq.flags = I2C_FLAG_READ;
00226   /* Select command to issue */
00227   seq.buf[0].data = i2c_read_data;
00228   seq.buf[0].len  = 2;
00229   /* Select location/length of data to be read */
00230   seq.buf[1].data = i2c_read_data;
00231   seq.buf[1].len  = 2;
00232 
00233   ret = I2CSPM_Transfer(i2c, &seq);
00234 
00235   if (ret != i2cTransferDone)
00236   {
00237     *data = 0;
00238     return((int) ret);
00239   }
00240 
00241   *data = ((uint32_t) i2c_read_data[0] << 8) + (i2c_read_data[1] & 0xfc);
00242 
00243   return((int) 2);
00244 }
00247 /**************************************************************************/
00261 int32_t Si7013_ReadNoHoldRHAndTemp(I2C_TypeDef *i2c, uint8_t addr, uint32_t *rhData,
00262                                    int32_t *tData)
00263 {
00264   int ret = Si7013_ReadNoHoldData(i2c, addr, rhData);
00265 
00266   if (ret == 2)
00267   {
00268     /* convert to milli-percent */
00269     *rhData = (((*rhData) * 15625L) >> 13) - 6000;
00270   }
00271   else
00272   {
00273     return -1;
00274   }
00275 
00276   ret = Si7013_Measure(i2c, addr, (uint32_t *) tData, SI7013_READ_TEMP);
00277 
00278   if (ret == 2)
00279   {
00280     *tData = (((*tData) * 21965L) >> 13) - 46850; /* convert to milli-degC */
00281   }
00282   else
00283   {
00284     return -1;
00285   }
00286 
00287   return 0;
00288 }

00305                                 int32_t *tData)
00306 {

00308

00310   {

00313   }
00314   else
00315   {
00316     return -1;

00320

00334 static int32_t Si7013_WriteUserReg2(I2C_TypeDef *i2c, uint8_t addr, int8_t data)
00335 {
00336   I2C_TransferSeq_TypeDef    seq;
00337   I2C_TransferReturn_TypeDef ret;
00338   uint8_t                    i2c_read_data[2];
00339   uint8_t                    i2c_write_data[2];
00340 
00341   seq.addr  = addr;
00342   seq.flags = I2C_FLAG_WRITE;
00343   /* Select command to issue */
00344   i2c_write_data[0] = 0x50;
00345   i2c_write_data[1] = data;
00346   seq.buf[0].data   = i2c_write_data;
00347   seq.buf[0].len    = 2;
00348   /* Select location/length of data to be read */
00349   seq.buf[1].data = i2c_read_data;
00350   seq.buf[1].len  = 0;
00351 
00352   ret = I2CSPM_Transfer(i2c, &seq);
00353 
00354   if (ret != i2cTransferDone)
00355   {
00356     return((int) ret);
00357   }
00358 
00359   return((int) 0);
00360 }

00376 int32_t Si7013_MeasureV(I2C_TypeDef *i2c, uint8_t addr, int32_t *vData)
00377 {
00378   int ret;
00379   Si7013_WriteUserReg2(i2c, addr, 0x0e);
00380   ret = Si7013_Measure(i2c, addr, (uint32_t *) vData, SI7013_READ_VIN);
00381   Si7013_WriteUserReg2(i2c, addr, 0x09);
00382   if (ret == 2)
00383   {
00384     /* convert  */
00385   }
00386   else
00387   {
00388     return -1;
00389   }
00390   return 0;
00391 }

00394 /**************************************************************************/
00407 bool Si7013_Detect(I2C_TypeDef *i2c, uint8_t addr, uint8_t *deviceId)
00408 {
00409   I2C_TransferSeq_TypeDef    seq;
00410   I2C_TransferReturn_TypeDef ret;
00411   uint8_t                    i2c_read_data[8];
00412   uint8_t                    i2c_write_data[2];
00413 
00414   seq.addr  = addr;
00415   seq.flags = I2C_FLAG_WRITE_READ;
00416   /* Select command to issue */
00417   i2c_write_data[0] = SI7013_READ_ID2_1;
00418   i2c_write_data[1] = SI7013_READ_ID2_2;
00419   seq.buf[0].data   = i2c_write_data;
00420   seq.buf[0].len    = 2;
00421   /* Select location/length of data to be read */
00422   seq.buf[1].data = i2c_read_data;
00423   seq.buf[1].len  = 8;
00424 
00425   ret = I2CSPM_Transfer(i2c, &seq);
00426   if (ret != i2cTransferDone)
00427   {
00428     return false;
00429   }
00430   if (NULL != deviceId)
00431   {
00432     *deviceId = i2c_read_data[0];
00433   }
00434   return true;
00435 }
